title: Cremator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Kill a player and cremate their body.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Cremating their body is similar to cleaning. Their role and will are Burnt. However, their face is also Burnt and won't be recognised. They won't get the "dead" role but they'll still be dead, and they will just appear as Burnt in the graveyard.

desc:

*I will not leave a single fragment of evidence.*
